course_description: Permission of Honors Coordinator required. Restricted to students accepted into the departmental Honors program. ENVS 495RWR may be used to fulfill a post-freshman writing requirement. Fulfills Independent Study requirement for ENVS majors (4 credit hrs). Does not count for ENVS Elective area credit
sections: Class Nbr: 6175, Section #: 1, Type: RSC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: E. Burchfield, Status: Open
